verses.name: 1 Kings 10:12
verses.text: And the king made of the almug trees pillars for the house of the Lord, and for the king’s house, harps also and psalteries for singers: there came no such almug trees, nor were seen unto this day.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:13
verses.text: And king Solomon gave unto the queen of Sheba all her desire, whatsoever she asked, beside that which Solomon gave her of his royal bounty. So she turned and went to her own country, she and her servants.

verses.name: 1 Kings 10:14
verses.text: Now the weight of gold that came to Solomon in one year was six hundred threescore and six talents of gold,
